summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the regulation and licensing of certain amusements and amusement devices for limited periods in connection with fetes or celebrations sponsored by certain community organizations; amending Section 23-c of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) to forbid the operation or use of licensed activities between the hours of 12:01 a.m. and 10:00 a.m., and repealing Section 23-c-1 thereof.
